    • Constructor Detail

      • SshRequestMessageWs

        public SshRequestMessageWs()

      • SshRequestMessageWs

        public SshRequestMessageWs(java.lang.String keyId,
                           java.lang.String comment,
                           byte[] publicKey,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> principals,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> criticalOptions,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,byte[]> additionalExtensions)
        Constructs a request message for an SSH certificate
        Parameters:
        keyId - the requested key ID
        comment - a comment to append to the end of the certificate, can be left bland
        publicKey - the public key to be signed, either an encoded Java PublicKey or a public key in SSH format as a byte array
        principals - a list of principals for the certificate. Leaving blank will create a wildcard certificate
        criticalOptions - the critical options to use
        additionalExtensions - any additional extensions besides those defined in the certificate profile, if allowed
